# Emergency trends indicators of raccoon in Europe

This is the homepage of the project. Here you can find the following sections:

- **Dashboard**: show emergency trend indicators based on number of observations and measured occupancy, i.e. the number of 1x1km grid cells with one or more observations.
- **About Data**: the workflow in R to calculate the emergency indicators.
